ancientkraft_rechapter.name: AncientKraft Rechapter
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: Dive into a world of ancestral magic and epic adventures. Explore ancient ruins, master arcane arts, and forge your legend in this RPG modpack full of mysteries to discover.

onepieceworlds2.name: One Piece World S2
onepieceworlds2.description: Navigate the most dangerous seas in search of the One Piece. Become a pirate, marine, or revolutionary in this second season full of new adventures, devil fruits, and epic battles.
onepieceworlds2.shortDescription: Pirate adventures on the high seas

luminakraft_world.name: LuminaKraft World
luminakraft_world.description: Our main survival server where the community gathers to build, explore, and create together. An enhanced vanilla world with plugins that enrich the experience without altering Minecraft's essence.

onepieceworld.name: One Piece World
onepieceworld.description: The first season of the One Piece universe in Minecraft. Explore unique islands, gain devil fruit powers, and live epic adventures in the most famous pirate world from anime.

ancientkraft.name: AncientKraft
ancientkraft.description: An adventure and RPG modpack that combines ancient magic with lost technology. Explore mysterious dimensions, build empires, and discover secrets that have remained hidden for millennia.

pt-the_full_course.name: PT: The Full Course
pt-the_full_course.description: A pure vanilla survival server where the classic Minecraft experience is lived to its fullest. Perfect for players seeking the authentic experience without modifications.
